description:
A converter designed by video editors. The professional compression tool accessible to all.

Shutter Encoder is one of the best video converter software, it handles images and audio too!
It has been designed by video editors in order to be as accessible and efficient as possible.
Shutter Encoder makes use of FFmpeg to handle its encoding, allowing support for almost every codec you’ve ever heard of, and many more you haven’t.
Don’t just take our word for it though, Avid themselves recommend Shutter Encoder as part of your Media Composer and ProTools ingesting workflow!
- Added "Translate" function
- Added "XAVC Long GOP" function
- Added "Custom..." option for "Audio transcription"
- Added "Prevent sleep mode" checkbox to "Settings" window
- Added "Timecode" section to "WAV", "AIFF" & "FLAC" functions
- Added "main422" to "Force profile" for "H.265" with "OSX VideoToolbox"
- Improved "Extract" function
- Improved bit depth detection
- Improved RAW image loading
- Improved RAW format support
- Improved UI size for small screens
- Improved "Cropping" loading with various scaling
- Improved "Audio transcription" subtitle formatting
- Ability to use in & out points with "Audio transcription" function
- Fixed bug with "AI" scaling
- Fixed bug with network path
- Fixed bug with "Extract" function
- Fixed bug with "Web video" function
- Fixed bug with "GPU decoding" on Linux
- Fixed bugs with "Add subtitles" checkbox
- Fixed bug with "Video Player" audio stuttering
- Fixed white spaces with "Audio transcription" function
- Fixed bug with "Generate in OP-Atom format" checkbox
